src:
Električni brivnik Xiaomi za manj kot 10 evrov

05 Nov 2019, 21:00

Kitajsko podjetje Xiaomi je eden največjih proizvajalcev pametnih mobilnih telefonov na svetu, vse pogosteje pa orje ledino tudi na drugih področjih. Tokrat nas je presenetilo z edinstvenim izdelkom, ki je pisan na kožo moškim. Tu namreč gre za vsestransko uporaben električni brivnik Xiaomi Youpin Enchen Black Stone 3D Electric Shaver, ki ga spletna prodajalna TomTop ponuja po nadvse ugodni ceni. Na spletni povezavi https://www.tomtop.com/p-paa1120.html?aid=SL&mid=10000034715&utm_source=KOL-Blog&utm_campaign=PAA1120&utm_content=3562 lahko namreč električni brivnik Xiaomi Youpin Enchen Black Stone 3D Electric Shaver kupimo za zgolj 9,99 evrov, kar je seveda zelo poceni.
Električni brivnik Xiaomi Youpin Enchen Black Stone 3D Electric Shaver je odporen na vodne curke, za britje pa ima na voljo kar tri 360 stopinjske brivne glave, ki omogočajo tako suho kot mokro britje, uporabnik pa lahko za britje izbira med počasnim vrtenjem in hitrejšim vrtenjem brivnih glav. Novost odlikujejo še dolga avtonomija delovanja in hitro polnjenje, saj lahko povsem izpraznjen brivnik napolnimo v zgolj uri. Ker avtonomija delovanja znaša več kot dva meseca ob običajni uporabi, ga ne bo treba polniti pogosto, kar je seveda tudi velika prednost.
Več informacij o zanimivem električnem brivniku Xiaomi Youpin Enchen Black Stone 3D Electric Shaver je na voljo na spletni povezavi https://www.tomtop.com/p-paa1120.html?aid=SL&mid=10000034715&utm_source=KOL-Blog&utm_campaign=PAA1120&utm_content=3562. Tu lahko seveda oddate tudi vaše naročilo, stroški pošiljanja v Slovenijo pa so brezplačni.

Obvestilo


Članek smo v uredništvu pripravili na osnovi objave v spletni trgovini. Pri nakupih iz spletnih trgovin veljajo pogoji nakupa posamezne trgovine. Pri navodilih ipd. pa obstaja možnost, da le-ta niso v slovenščini ali angleščini. Uredništvo ne prevzema odgovornosti za nakup. Za kakršne koli informacije ali reklamacije se obrnite na spletnega trgovca, uredništvo pa prosim obvestite (e-naslov uredništva: rn@stromboli.si), da se v bodoče opisom izdelkov iz teh spletnih strani lahko izognemo.




Povezave: Tomtop
text:
Xiaomi Electric Shaver for less than $ 10

05 Nov 2019, 21:00

China's Xiaomi is one of the largest smartphone makers in the world, and is increasingly breaking ground in other areas. This time we were surprised by the unique product that is written on the skin of men. This is a versatile Xiaomi Youpin Enchen Black Stone 3D Electric Shaver electric shaver, which TomTop offers at a great price. At https://www.tomtop.com/p-paa1120.html?aid=EN&mid=10000034715&utm_source=KOL-Blog&utm_campaign=PAA1120&utm_content=3562 you can buy the Xiaomi Youpin Enchen Black Stone 3D Electric Shaver Electric Shaver for only 9.99 Euros, which is of course very cheap.
The Xiaomi Youpin Enchen Black Stone 3D Electric Shaver Electric Shaver is water resistant, with a shave of as many as three 360 degree shaving heads for both dry and wet shaving, and the user can choose between slow rotation and faster shaving Chief The novelty is the long autonomy of operation and fast charging, since the fully emptied shaver can be recharged in just an hour. Since operating autonomy is more than two months of normal use, it will not need to be filled frequently, which is of course a great advantage.
More information on the interesting Xiaomi Youpin Enchen Black Stone 3D Electric Shaver Electric Shaver is available at https://www.tomtop.com/p-paa1120.html?aid=EN&mid=10000034715&utm_source=KOL-Blog&utm_campaign=PAA1120&utm_content=3562. Of course, you can also place your order here, and shipping costs to Slovenia are free of charge.

Notification


The article in the editorial was prepared on the basis of publication in an online store. Purchases from online stores are subject to the terms of purchase for each store. For instructions, etc. however, they may not be in Slovene or English. The Editorial Board assumes no responsibility for the purchase. Contact any online retailer for any information or complaints, and please inform the editorial office (editorial email: rn@stromboli.si) so that future product descriptions from these sites can be avoided.
